basic_information.scholarship_name: John & Maxine Kessler Endowed Memorial Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - John & Maxine Kessler Endowed Memorial Scho

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies. Eligibility Requirements Open to any student majoring in any field related to the UCO College of Education & Professional Studies Minimum 3.0 GPA Demonstrates financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
